snippet.title: Off The Grid - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Dive into the heat of a covert corporate war in Off The Grid, a cyberpunk Battle Royale 2.0 where you shape the story and the gameplay. Unfolding on a dystopian tropical island, OTG sends you on head-spinning assassination and sabotage missions to the greater glory and market share of your chosen faction. Tool up, it’s about to get bloody!

Visit the official website: https://gameoffthegrid.com/ 

Follow the development:
👉 Twitter: https://twitter.com/playoffthegrid
👉 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playoffthegrid
👉 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PlayOffTheGrid

#OffTheGridGame #OTGGame #GunzillaGames #BattleRoyale
